doc:
Ron Butler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ron_Butler 0 Ronald "Ron/Ronnie" Butler, Jr. is a Bahamian-born American television actor, director and comedian who is best known for portraying Oscar, the clever receptionist, on the television series True Jackson, VP, from 2008 to 2011. He often portrays former President Barack Obama in comedy sketches. He has performed with the Atlantic Theater Company for over 20 years. Ronald_"_Ron/Ronnie_"_Butler , Jr. is a_Bahamian-born_American_television_actor , director and comedian who is_best_known for portraying_Oscar , the_clever_receptionist , on the_television_series_True_Jackson_,_VP_, from 2008 to 2011 . He often portrays former_President_Barack_Obama in comedy_sketches . He has_performed with the_Atlantic_Theater_Company for over_20_years .
